data.name: btnSelectHandle.Text
data.value: Select window or control to scroll...

data.name: chkAutoUpload.Text
data.value: Upload/save depending on after capture settings

data.name: cbStartSelectionAutomatically.Text
data.value: Start selecting capture region before opening this window

data.name: cbStartCaptureAutomatically.Text
data.value: Start scrolling capture immediately after capture region selection

data.name: lblNote.Text
data.value: Please note that whilst ShareX attempts its best effort to render an accurate scrolling capture it is still not possible for every scrolling content to be captured correctly. Main reasons which can cause issues while combining are movements on screen while capturing e.g. if a web page has animated GIF or having static objects on screen while scrolling e.g. having static menu or buttons on web page which does not change its position but the rest of the web page scrolls.

data.name: btnStartTask.Text
data.value: Upload/save depending on after capture settings
